title: The Immortals of Meluha
quotes: Brahaspati: "Remember, whether a man is a legend or not is decided by history, not fortune-tellers."
He was in a world where the only sound was the harmonious melody of Sati's heavy breathing. A tune he could blissfully dance to for his next seven lives.

title: Kane and Abel
quotes: Then one morning she woke to find him sitting on the edge of the bed, staring at her. She blinked at him. 'Is something wrong, darling?' 'No. I'm just looking at my greatest asset, and making sure I never take it for granted.'

title: Suits
quotes: It's going to happen because I am going to make it happen.
Work until you no longer have to introduce yourself.
Let them hate. Just make sure they spell your name right.

title: Arrow
quotes: When I'm out in the field, my bow, my arrows, those are just tools. I'm the weapon.

I'm going to tear everything he cares about away from him, destroy those who choose to follow him, corrupt those he loves. Once he has lost everyone and everything he values, I will drive an arrow through his eye.

title: Boss babe
quotes: How many success stories do you need to hear before you make your own?

title: The Dark Knight
quotes: If you're good at something, never do it for free.

title: Abraham Lincoln
quotes: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
